name: Revenge: Rhobar's myth
description: A magical world full of witchcraft and wizardry awaits you!Join the worlds best wizard academy and embark on an exciting, mysterious journey. Learn 4 different and mighty spells to change the world around you, experience a breathtaking plot about the lost wizard Rhobar or challenge yourself in the freeroam mode!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win7 32-bit, Win8/8.1 32-bit Processor: Core 2 Duo E8200 2.66GHz or Phenom II X2 545 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTS 250 or Radeon HD 4830 (at least 1GB VRAM) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: The game could run on Windows XP but is not tested! The requirements can change during development. The use of mobile GPUs can sometimes cause problems.
recommended_requirements: OS: Win7 64-bit, Win8/8.1 64-bit Processor: Core 2 Quad Q9550 2.83GHz or Phenom II X4 955 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Radeon HD 6950 (at least 2GB VRAM) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: The requirements can change during development. The use of mobile GPUs can sometimes cause problems.

reviews.review_text: This is a poorman's Skyrim  Terrible Voice Acting A 'Respawn' Key   Still completely unsure about this one   Terrible Options Terrible 'Cutscenes' Even when turning FPS cap off, it barely runs above 30fps Little to no variance between NPC models, I think there are around 20 different NPC models in total. Movement is not smooth at all for NPCs EX: Gliding with their legs moving in a walking motion to simulate walking. Terrible Pop-in Extremely Boring and hardly fun
